senselogic.sitevision.api.resource

Interface LandingPageUtil


  • @Requireable(value="LandingPageUtil")
public interface LandingPageUtil
    Utility interface for getting landing pages.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getLandingPageUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 3.5.1
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node getCollaborationGroupsPage()
      Gets the collaboration groups page (lists all accessible collaboration groups) of current site.
      Node getContactsPage()
      Gets the contacts page (information about the contacts of current/specified user identity) of current site.
      Node getErrorPage()
      Gets the error page (404) of current site.
      Node getFilesPage()
      Gets the files page (information about the files of a collaboration group) of current site.
      Node getLoginPage()
      Gets the login page (401) of current site.
      Node getMembersPage()
      Gets the members page (lists all members of a specified collaboration group) of current site.
      Node getMessagesPage()
      Gets the messages page of current site.
      Node getProfilePage()
      Gets the profile page (information about current/specified user identity) of current site.
      Node getTagTimelinePage()
      Gets the tag timeline page (displays the timeline for a specified tag) of current site.
      Node getTimelineEntryPage()
      Gets the timeline entry page (displays a single timeline entry) of current site.
      Node getTopicTimelinePage()
      Gets the topic timeline page of current site.
      Node getUserIdentitySearchResultPage()
      Gets the user identity search result page of current site.

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorPage

        Node getErrorPage()
        Gets the error page (404) of current site.
        Returns:
        the error page, or null if current site has no such page specified.

      • getLoginPage

        Node getLoginPage()
        Gets the login page (401) of current site.
        Returns:
        the login page, or null if current site has no such page specified.

      • getProfilePage

        Node getProfilePage()
        Gets the profile page (information about current/specified user identity) of current site.
        Returns:
        the profile page, or null if current site has no such page specified.

        Since:

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
